question: So i went for my regular check up the other day. I'll be 30 weeks sunday. My bp was 130/90 which he said is border line High, so I am going to start seeing him once a week from now in out  because of my age and history.  My last pregnancy 7 yrs ago ended in preterm delivery due to preeclampsia.  I really don't want a repeat. Any ideas on how I can control it or bring it down?
title: Border line High blood pressure
